name: Marco Diaz
info:
• 简体中文名: 马可·迪亚兹
  • 别名: 麥戈·迪亞
  • 别名: Marco Ubaldo Diaz
  • 别名: マルコ・ディアス
  • 性别: 男
detail: Marco, 14, is Star’s quirky best friend on Earth. Before she came into his life, he was known as “the safe kid,” even though he always thought of himself as a “misunderstood bad boy.” Star has helped him come out of his shell and take chances. The yin to her yang, he is the more responsible of the two and makes sure they don’t get into TOO much trouble.
